# Government Tender Announcement
## Fuel Tank Replacement, Yellowknife, Northwest Territories

### Project Details
* Reference Number: PW-PWU-183-12334
* Solicitation Number: F2301-220010/A
* Publication Date: October 24, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 8, 2022 at 4:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

### Project Description
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is soliciting a bid for the replacement of an above-ground 4,900 liter fuel storage tank and associated piping and fuel dispenser in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories. The selected bidder will be responsible for providing all labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary for the removal and disposal of the existing fuel storage tank and the installation of a new fuel storage tank and associated piping and fuel dispenser.

### Mandatory Requirements
* The bidder must provide two (2) reference projects undertaken within the last five years relating to fuel tank replacement.
* The bidder must comply with all applicable territorial and federal guidelines, acts, regulations, and standards for the disposal of petroleum products and equipment.

### Selection Process
The selection process is a two-phase process. Phase One involves the evaluation of bidder qualifications. Phase Two will invite qualified bidders to submit a financial bid based on the project specifications and drawings.

### Contracting Information
* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Contracting Authority: Alexandre Tikhonovitch
* Telephone: (780) 901-7940
* Email: alex.tikhonovitch@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca

### Trade Agreements
* The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement.

### Language of Submission
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
